website_summaries.verdict: Padding set features a different shape than some others, but those who like the fit will swear by it.
pros: Uses a pointed end on the part of the wedge closest to the back of the knee, rather than a 4-sided design, which some will love
Uses memory foam in the construction so it conforms comfortably to the catcher's leg
Uses strap channels sewn into the pad for a tight fit to the shin guards
cons: Memory foam construction is best for 1 catcher to use, instead of all catchers on team

customer_reviews.title: using for shooting support
customer_reviews.text: they start off a little stiff, but after a few sessions they break in nicely. They'll hold form for a while and then snap back to baseline after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Chantil

customer_reviews.title: Quality seller
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter who catches in softball. They go on easy enough and helped her knee strain. The price was nice and the seller shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cory S

customer_reviews.title: Unsure About Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Missed that these are large knee protectors, much too big for my 10 year old. Very stiff, not sure how comfortable they would have been if she had been able to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: The way the hook on was a bit difficult. But they work and are fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Great add on for Mizuno Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: Work great with Mizuno catchers shin guards. Have a soft feel to the pad, Son loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A real knee saver, if you are a catcher.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew used these for the first time last week for his game and, although his team lost, he loved the fit, comfort and protection the Misuno catcher's gear afforded him.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl & Norma Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids love their knee savers. Especially during their long games and catching practice.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase, fast delivery, very good product. Recommended the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Horacio

customer_reviews.title: Will fit almost any shin guard strap arrangement.
customer_reviews.text: Well Built and Tough. Better material than KneeSavers uses. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Too big for a 14yr old girl. but great quality. She will grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: System Admin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great products really helped with my kids knee being supported while catching!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described - works great - a little stiff, not as comfy as Eastons
customer_reviews.author: dww

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: Great weges....have used for several outs and have heald shape nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MOM OF 4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable, holds up well, tends to slide to the sides a bit too much
customer_reviews.author: REDDOT4

customer_reviews.title: Good equality
customer_reviews.text: They fit great with the mizuno samari leg guards. My daughter likes the firmness. They slide to the side at times but overall work great.
customer_reviews.author: nicole ruelas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Got the large size for my 12 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Got the large size for my 12 year old wearing the intermediate sized samurai shin guards.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sugawara

customer_reviews.title: Love the memory foam
customer_reviews.text: These replaced my old set, again very happy. Comfortable and easy to use. Recommend to any catcher, teenage to adult.
customer_reviews.author: Kikkin

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this item for baseball. My husband is a salesman and is in his car a lot. He would get leg cramps because his leg is too long to rest on the car seat on long drives, so I bought this wedge to slide under his leg. It works! No more leg cramps!
customer_reviews.author: Aquamom

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 10 year old grandson. Easy to attach to his shin guards and keeps its shape after lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: vise7

customer_reviews.title: ... through is very large and the shin guard straps easily slid through
customer_reviews.text: The opening for the strap to go through is very large and the shin guard straps easily slid through. After only minimal usage, the opening ripped rendering them useless. Of course, I am unable to return as I am past my 30 days. Not the high quality product Mizuno is known for, very disappointed. Guess we will go back to Easton!
customer_reviews.author: D.beck

customer_reviews.title: my son finally figured out that if you crisscross the bottom two shin guard straps they hold better.
customer_reviews.text: These knee savers have solid support for my son when he catches. The only thing holding it back from 5 stars is that the pads kept slipping out of the straps, my son finally figured out that if you crisscross the bottom two shin guard straps they hold better.
customer_reviews.author: Leon P. Cammarano

product_meta.title: Mizuno Catcher's Knee Wedge, Black, Small
product_meta.description: The Catcher's knee guards are a must for every catcher. The added comfort will help your legs stay fresh and reduce the wear and tear on your knees
feature_bullets: Helps relieve stress on your Knees
Anatomical design pre-curved padding for the ideal fit while catching
Multiple straps channels for customized fit
